Comment: The response provides a thorough explanation of the concept of the priesthood of all believers from a Christian perspective, referencing relevant biblical passages and emphasizing the role of every believer in worship, intercession, and service. The connection between Jesus as the High Priest and believers as priests is well-articulated, affirming the direct access to God through Christ. The answer effectively addresses the concern regarding understanding the priesthood of all believers. Great job!
